<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataML extends data { const CODE = 'ML'; const PREFIX = 223; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[246-9]\d|50)\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '2(?:07[0-8]|12[67])\d{4}|(?:2(?:02|1[4-689])|4(?:0[0-4]|4[1-39]))\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '2(?:079|17\d)\d{4}|(?:50|[679]\d|8[239])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '80\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{4})'=>'$1', '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
